name: The Gods' Elixir Pack
description:
My name is Julio and this is my first game jam as well as my first ever made game. My entire objective with this jam is to learn as much as I can and have fun, both things were amazingly fulfilled.  I know the game is kinda bad, but makes me proud see it and think that it's my first game.

#region Pre-Made Assets

Forest Background -> @edermunizz https://edermunizz.itch.io/free-pixel-art-forest

Knight Character -> @LuizMelo https://luizmelo.itch.io/hero-knight-2
